name: Mah - Mahjong
description:
The  original open source version of many Mahjong games out there. Completely free, no ads.

A Mahjong Solitaire Board Game built with HTML5, SVG & Angular.

Features:

* 32 boards to play

* 12 different tile/piece image sets

* 8 game backgrounds

* 3 difficulties

* Automatic save & restore of game state - start game today in the bus, finish at home. You can always start a new game on the top right.

* English, German

* Source code available at https://github.com/ffalt/mah

Hotkeys:

T - Show possible moves

U - Undo last move

N - Start a new game

P - Continue/Pause game

I - Tiles Information

Have fun!
